company.description:
The European Commission proposes laws, makes sure EU laws are properly applied, and manages EU spending programmes.
Unit DIGIT.B.3 provides, promotes and supports Trans-European Services, i.e. systems with responsibilities distributed across the Commission, national administrations and other bodies such as agencies.
EU Provisioning is a business-critical ecosystem of diverse solutions that transform HR data into IT-usable entitlements.

role.description:
As a Web Developer Consultant, I was in charge of new features development in the new tool, MSC.
I participated in design meetings, gathering feedbacks to develop the best feature in terms of needs, performance and error handling.

I was also missioned to train new recruits, as well as create tools using new technologies for better and faster developments.

realisations.title: Maintainability
realisations.description: Provide highly maintainable, tested and documented solutions

realisations.title: Specific Tooling & Automation
realisations.description: Develop tools that automate the work of teams and gain performance

realisations.title: Reporting
realisations.description: Multiple reporting tools, as well as checks and log analytics

realisations.title: Workflows, Validation & Simulation
realisations.description: Multi-step workflows, with provisioning simulation and validation

realisations.title: Training and new technologies
realisations.description: Onboard new members, and implement new testing and lifecycle technologies

products.name: MSC
products.description: User Provisioning, Identity Access Management and Governance Administration
products.longDescription: Product that permits Team Managers and other product maintainers to administrate users, rights and groups
